text: Sarah Melgire (born 20 August 1991) is a Martiniquais association football player. She is a member of the Martinique women's national football team. She played at the 2014 CONCACAF Women's Championship. At the club level, she plays for VGA Saint-Maur FF in France. == References == Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:Caribbean footballers Category:People from Martinique Category:French footballers
title: Sarah Melgire
